a scenic view of the ocean as we ride along the shore
we rode to the end and we are going to the tents

output.sentences: To get to the meeting they had to take a bicycle excursion.
They were riding on the side of the highway.
The could view the scenic shore from where they were.
They were giving away prizes at the fair.
